author: philip
msg: Fix a couple of memory access problems identified by valgrind.
memory before the start of a zero length string.
(my_rand): While I'm here, handle rand() returning RAND_MAX.

author: kfogel
msg: Pay attention to externals property on checkout.  This is part of
external references and go get them.
(svn_cstring_split): Optionally append to an existing array, and
take an array of sep_chars instead of a single sep_char.  Use
(add_ignore_patterns): Take pointer to an array, for consistency,
and just use svn_cstring_split instead of writing it out by hand.

author: kfogel
msg: Rename `basename' to `base_name' throughout the code, to avoid
conflict with the C library basename() function.
